synopsis.text: Yoshioka Kiyoe, renowned vocalist of the band Ikimono Gakari, released her first solo single, 'Massara,' which inspired an original animated short film. Directed by Keita Nagahara and animated by Enishiya Inc., the anime revolves around two young women, Nazuna and Yuna, who find themselves at a crossroads in life. Nazuna, a singer-songwriter on the verge of abandoning her dreams, encounters Yuna, a timid girl who struggles to express herself. As their paths intertwine, they inspire each other to shape their futures and chase their aspirations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
